meanings.definition: A lawyer or legal representative in India.
meanings.sent1: The vakils presented their case in court.
meanings.sent2: Many vakils work tirelessly to defend their clients.
meanings.sent3: The vakils joked about legal loopholes during their lunch break.
meanings.sent4: The vakils were like knights fighting for justice in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the vakils in their black robes is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'vakil', meaning lawyers or legal representatives in India.
meanings.sent1: The team of vakils collaborated on the complex case.
meanings.sent2: In India, many vakils provide legal assistance to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The group of vakils celebrated their victory with a traditional dance.
meanings.sent4: The vakils stood united like a shield against injustice.
meanings.sent5: The courtroom buzzed with the presence of the vakils.
